description.setup: Straddle bar or T-bar, bent over position. V-handle or close grip. Athletic stance for stability.
description.movement: Row handle to stomach area. Focus on pulling elbows back. Strong contraction between shoulder blades.
description.cues: Elbows lead the pull, handle to stomach, big squeeze between shoulders, control the weight

description.overview: Push-up variation with hands in diamond shape. Emphasizes triceps and inner chest while building pushing strength.
description.setup: High plank with hands forming diamond shape under chest. Body straight from head to heels.
description.movement: Lower chest to hands maintaining diamond shape. Press back up focusing on triceps. Keep body rigid.
description.cues: Diamond stays put, chest to hands, feel triceps working, rigid body line

description.overview: Push-up variation in pike position targeting shoulders. Progression toward handstand push-ups while building shoulder strength.
description.setup: Downward dog position, hands shoulder-width apart. Higher pike for more difficulty.
description.movement: Lower head toward hands by bending elbows. Press back to start. Feel shoulders working hard.
description.cues: High pike position, head toward hands, shoulders do the work, controlled movement

description.overview: Complex full-body movement from floor to standing with weight overhead. Ultimate stability and strength challenge.
description.setup: Lying on back with kettlebell locked out overhead. Opposite leg bent, same side leg straight.
description.movement: Rise to standing through series of positions keeping weight overhead. Reverse to return to floor.
description.cues: Eyes on weight, slow and controlled, strong overhead position, master each position

description.overview: Combination movement linking squat with calf raise. Builds lower body strength through multiple planes of motion.
description.setup: Standard squat stance with weight of choice. Ready for fluid transition to calf raise.
description.movement: Perform squat, then immediately rise onto toes for calf raise. Lower heels and repeat sequence.
description.cues: Smooth transitions, full squat first, high onto toes, control both movements

description.overview: Explosive movement bringing kettlebell from floor to rack position. Builds power and teaches clean mechanics.
description.setup: Kettlebell between feet, athletic stance. Ready for explosive hip drive and catch in rack.
description.movement: Hike bell back, explosive hip snap, high pull, catch in rack position at shoulder. Control descent.
description.cues: Explosive hips, high pull, soft catch, bell rests on forearm, smooth descent

description.overview: Explosive movement from floor to overhead in one motion. Ultimate power exercise requiring technique and conditioning.
description.setup: Kettlebell between feet, wider stance than clean. Ready for explosive full-body movement.
description.movement: Hike back, explosive hip drive, high pull, punch through to overhead lockout. Control down.
description.cues: Violent hip snap, high pull, punch through overhead, soft lockout, controlled descent

description.overview: Stability exercise with kettlebell overhead while touching floor. Builds shoulder stability and hip mobility.
description.setup: Kettlebell locked out overhead, feet wide. Free hand ready to reach toward floor.
description.movement: Keep bell overhead while hinging to touch floor with free hand. Return maintaining overhead position.
description.cues: Bell stays overhead, hinge at hips, feel hamstring stretch, don't let bell drift

description.overview: Front-loaded squat with kettlebell in rack position. Challenges core stability while building leg strength.
description.setup: Kettlebell in rack position at shoulder. Elbow down, bell rests on forearm. Standard squat stance.
description.movement: Squat down maintaining rack position. Bell challenges posture. Drive up keeping bell stable.
description.cues: Maintain rack position, elbow stays down, fight forward lean, drive through heels

description.overview: Circular movement passing kettlebell around head. Builds shoulder mobility and stability through full range.
description.setup: Light kettlebell held by horns. Standing tall with core engaged. Ready for controlled circular motion.
description.movement: Pass bell around head in smooth circle. Keep core tight. Reverse direction for balance.
description.cues: Smooth circles, core stays tight, control the bell, both directions, light weight only

description.overview: Alternating single-arm rows in bent-over position with two kettlebells. Builds back strength with anti-rotation challenge.
description.setup: Two kettlebells between feet, bent over position. One hand on each bell, athletic stance.
description.movement: Row one bell to hip while other stays on ground. Alternate sides while maintaining position.
description.cues: One at a time, maintain bent position, fight rotation, feel the lat squeeze

description.overview: Hip thrust using barbell for loading. Premier glute exercise allowing maximum load through hip extension.
description.setup: Upper back on bench, barbell in hip crease with pad. Feet flat, knees at 90° at top.
description.movement: Drive through heels to thrust hips up. Full hip extension with glute squeeze. Control descent.
description.cues: Drive through heels, big hip extension, squeeze glutes hard, control the negative

description.overview: Squat with barbell behind legs. Unique loading pattern emphasizing quads while reducing forward lean.
description.setup: Barbell behind legs, deadlift grip behind body. Heels may be elevated. Upright torso.
description.movement: Squat down with bar behind legs. More upright than back squat. Drive up through heels.
description.cues: Bar stays behind, upright torso, feel quads working, heels down or elevated

description.overview: Squat holding barbell in elbow crease. Challenges core massively while building leg strength with front loading.
description.setup: Bar in elbow crease, arms crossed. Pad may be needed. Upright torso position required.
description.movement: Squat down maintaining upright position. Bar loading challenges core. Drive up staying upright.
description.cues: Bar in elbows, stay upright, core works overtime, drive through heels

description.overview: Squat starting from bottom position in pins. Eliminates stretch reflex, builds strength from dead stop.
description.setup: Bar on pins at bottom squat position. Get under bar in squat position. Eliminate momentum.
description.movement: Press up from dead stop in bottom position. No stretch reflex available. Lower back to pins.
description.cues: Start from dead stop, no stretch reflex, pure strength, control back to pins

description.overview: Glute bridge using barbell for heavy loading. Builds maximum glute strength through hip extension pattern.
description.setup: Lying on back with barbell over hips, pad recommended. Feet flat, knees bent. Bar secured in place.
description.movement: Drive hips up squeezing glutes maximally. Create straight line from knees to shoulders. Control descent.
description.cues: Drive heels into floor, massive glute squeeze, full hip extension, control the weight

description.overview: Straddle squat with barbell between legs. Unique loading pattern reducing spinal compression while targeting legs.
description.setup: Straddle barbell with one hand in front, one behind. Athletic stance. Bar between legs.
description.movement: Squat down with bar between legs. Drive up maintaining straddle position. Switch hand positions between sets.
description.cues: Straddle the bar, upright torso, switch grip between sets, feel the different loading

description.overview: Hip hinge movement with bar on back. Builds posterior chain strength and teaches proper hinge mechanics.
description.setup: Bar on upper back like back squat. Feet hip-width apart. Core braced, shoulder blades tight.
description.movement: Hinge at hips pushing back while maintaining flat back. Feel hamstring stretch. Drive hips forward.
description.cues: Hips back not down, chest proud, feel hamstrings, drive hips through to finish

description.overview: Bent-over row starting from floor each rep. Builds explosive back strength and eliminates momentum.
description.setup: Bar on floor, bent over position. Reset to floor between each rep. Parallel torso to floor.
description.movement: Explosively row bar from floor to lower chest. Lower back to floor. Reset position each rep.
description.cues: Dead stop each rep, explosive pull, chest high, reset every time

description.overview: Underhand barbell row with more upright torso. Emphasizes lower lats and biceps involvement.
description.setup: Underhand grip, more upright than traditional row. Torso at 45-degree angle instead of parallel.
description.movement: Row bar to lower abdomen with underhand grip. Feel biceps and lower lats working. Control descent.
description.cues: Underhand grip, more upright, pull to belly, feel biceps helping, squeeze lats

description.overview: Isolation exercise for upper traps using barbell. Builds trap mass and strength through elevation movement.
description.setup: Barbell at arm's length, standing tall. Feet hip-width, shoulders back and down to start.
description.movement: Shrug shoulders straight up as high as possible. Squeeze traps at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Straight up not forward, squeeze at top, feel traps working, control the negative

description.overview: Standing bicep curl using barbell. Classic mass-building exercise for bicep development and arm strength.
description.setup: Barbell at arm's length, standing with core engaged. Elbows at sides, shoulders back.
description.movement: Curl bar up using only biceps. No swinging or momentum. Squeeze at top. Lower with control.
description.cues: Elbows stay put, no swinging, squeeze biceps, control the negative, strict form

description.overview: Tricep isolation exercise lying on bench. Builds tricep mass and strength through elbow extension.
description.setup: Lying on bench with barbell over chest. Arms extended, narrow grip. Core engaged.
description.movement: Lower bar toward forehead by bending elbows only. Extend back to start. Keep elbows stationary.
description.cues: Only elbows move, to forehead not chest, stretch triceps, strong extension

description.overview: Vertical pulling exercise targeting shoulders and traps. Builds shoulder width and upper back development.
description.setup: Barbell at arm's length with narrow grip. Standing tall, core engaged for stability.
description.movement: Pull bar straight up leading with elbows. Bar stays close to body. Pull to chest level.
description.cues: Elbows lead, bar stays close, pull to chest, feel shoulders and traps

description.overview: Behind-neck to front press without lockout. Builds shoulder endurance and stability through partial range.
description.setup: Bar in front rack position. Light weight recommended. Mobility required for behind-neck position.
description.movement: Press partially up, bring behind neck, press back to front. Continuous tension throughout.
description.cues: Light weight only, mobility required, continuous motion, feel shoulders burning

description.overview: Single-arm pressing using landmine setup. Provides unique angle and challenges core stability.
description.setup: Barbell in landmine, one hand holding end. Athletic stance, core engaged for stability.
description.movement: Press barbell up and forward in arc motion. Feel chest and shoulders working. Control descent.
description.cues: Arc motion not straight, core stays tight, feel chest and shoulders, control the path

description.overview: Core exercise rolling barbell forward from knees. Advanced ab exercise building tremendous core strength.
description.setup: Kneeling with hands on barbell. Core maximally braced. Ready to roll forward while maintaining position.
description.movement: Roll bar forward while maintaining straight line. Feel massive ab stretch. Roll back with control.
description.cues: Core on fire, straight line, feel ab stretch, don't collapse, control back

description.overview: Single-arm landmine row with parallel stance. Unique pulling angle for lat development and core challenge.
description.setup: Barbell in landmine, parallel stance. One hand on bar end, wide base for stability.
description.movement: Row barbell to hip with parallel stance. Feel lat working through unique angle. Control stretch.
description.cues: Parallel stance, row to hip, unique angle, feel the lat, control the stretch

description.overview: Deadlift using hexagonal trap bar. More quad-dominant than conventional, easier on lower back.
description.setup: Stand inside trap bar, grab handles. More upright position than conventional deadlift.
description.movement: Drive through legs while chest rises. More leg drive than conventional. Lock out standing tall.
description.cues: Stand up tall, more leg drive, chest up, feel quads working, easier on back

description.overview: Squat using cambered bar for accommodating resistance. Bar flexes providing different resistance curve.
description.setup: Cambered bar on upper back. May feel bouncy or springy. Standard squat stance and position.
description.movement: Squat with cambered bar feeling different resistance. Bar may assist at bottom, resist at top.
description.cues: Feel the different resistance, control the spring, use the bar's help, unique feel

description.overview: Explosive pulling movement from floor to chest level. Builds power and teaches clean mechanics.
description.setup: Deadlift position with barbell. Athletic stance, ready for explosive triple extension.
description.movement: Deadlift explosively, then continue pulling bar to chest level. Elbows high. Control descent.
description.cues: Explosive pull, elbows high, pull to chest, triple extension, control down

description.overview: Explosive movement from floor to front rack position. Olympic lift developing total-body power.
description.setup: Deadlift position with clean grip. Athletic stance, ready for explosive movement and catch.
description.movement: Deadlift explosively, high pull, drop under bar catching in front rack. Stand to finish.
description.cues: Explosive pull, drop under bar, catch in front rack, fast elbows, stand tall

description.overview: Explosive movement from floor to overhead in one motion. Olympic lift requiring technique and power.
description.setup: Wide grip deadlift position. Athletic stance, ready for explosive movement to overhead catch.
description.movement: Deadlift explosively, high pull, drop under catching overhead. Stand to complete lift.
description.cues: Wide grip, explosive pull, drop under, catch overhead, fast turnover, stand strong

description.overview: High-intensity combination exercise performed for time. Builds cardiovascular fitness and full-body strength endurance.
description.setup: Dumbbells at shoulders in athletic stance. Ready for continuous movement during timed intervals.
description.movement: Squat down, drive up explosively pressing dumbbells overhead. Continuous rhythm for prescribed time.
description.cues: Smooth transitions, use leg drive, breathe with movement, maintain pace under fatigue

description.overview: Push-ups performed in Tabata protocol (20 seconds work, 10 seconds rest, 8 rounds). Builds muscular endurance.
description.setup: Standard push-up position. Mental preparation for 8 rounds of maximum effort work.
description.movement: Maximum push-ups for 20 seconds, rest 10 seconds. Repeat 8 times. Maintain form under fatigue.
description.cues: All-out effort, quick rest, form over speed when tired, embrace the burn

description.overview: Multi-exercise circuit using resistance bands for time. Builds endurance while targeting multiple muscle groups.
description.setup: Multiple resistance bands ready for various exercises. Stations set up for quick transitions.
description.movement: Rotate through band exercises for prescribed time. Maintain intensity throughout circuit.
description.cues: Quick transitions, maintain tension, feel muscles working, push through fatigue

description.overview: High-intensity back-focused exercises performed in intervals. Builds back endurance and thickness.
description.setup: Back exercise stations ready (rows, pull-ups, pulldowns). Quick transitions between exercises.
description.movement: Perform back exercises at high intensity for time. Focus on back muscles throughout.
description.cues: Feel back working, maintain intensity, squeeze between shoulders, power through

description.overview: Explosive leg exercises performed in intervals. Develops lower body power and conditioning.
description.setup: Plyometric exercises ready (jump squats, box jumps, bounds). Safe landing surface.
description.movement: Explosive leg movements for time. Focus on power output and quick ground contact.
description.cues: Explosive movements, quick ground contact, maintain power, land softly

description.overview: Dynamic core exercise alternating elbow to knee in supine position. Targets obliques and rectus abdominis.
description.setup: Lying on back, hands behind head, knees bent up. Lower back pressed to floor.
description.movement: Bring opposite elbow to knee while extending other leg. Alternate in cycling motion.
description.cues: Opposite elbow to knee, cycling motion, back stays flat, feel obliques working

description.overview: Isometric glute activation exercise. Simple but effective for glute activation and mind-muscle connection.
description.setup: Standing, sitting, or lying position. Focus on glute muscles, ready for contraction.
description.movement: Squeeze glutes as hard as possible. Hold contraction for specified time. Release and repeat.
description.cues: Maximum squeeze, hold the contraction, feel glutes working, mind-muscle connection

description.overview: Core exercise lifting straight legs from supine position. Targets lower abs and hip flexors.
description.setup: Lying on back, legs straight, hands at sides or under glutes. Lower back neutral.
description.movement: Raise straight legs to vertical without touching floor between reps. Control the movement.
description.cues: Legs stay straight, back flat on floor, control up and down, breathe out on lift

description.overview: Rehabilitation exercise for quadriceps strengthening. Focuses on terminal knee extension with support.
description.setup: Sitting with towel roll under knee. Leg supported, ready for controlled extension movement.
description.movement: Extend knee over towel roll focusing on quad contraction. Hold briefly, lower with control.
description.cues: Squeeze quad hard, full extension, hold the contraction, controlled movement

description.overview: Plyometric exercise jumping laterally from one foot to other. Builds lateral power and stability.
description.setup: Athletic stance ready to bound sideways. Clear lateral space for movement.
description.movement: Bound laterally landing on outside foot, absorb and bound back. Continuous lateral movement.
description.cues: Explosive sideways, soft landings, absorb and explode, maintain rhythm

description.overview: Balance exercise walking heel-to-toe in straight line. Improves balance and proprioception.
description.setup: Standing ready to walk in straight line. Arms out for balance if needed.
description.movement: Walk placing heel directly in front of toes. Maintain straight line, eyes forward.
description.cues: Heel to toe, straight line, eyes forward, arms for balance, controlled pace

description.overview: Dynamic hip flexor stretch while walking. Improves hip mobility and activates glutes.
description.setup: Standing ready to walk forward while performing knee hugs to chest.
description.movement: Walk forward pulling alternating knees to chest. Feel hip flexor stretch and glute activation.
description.cues: Knee to chest, feel hip flexor stretch, opposite glute squeeze, maintain walking pace

description.overview: Walking on heels with toes lifted. Strengthens shin muscles and improves ankle dorsiflexion.
description.setup: Standing with toes lifted up, weight on heels. Ready to walk on heels only.
description.movement: Walk forward on heels keeping toes lifted throughout. Feel shin muscles working.
description.cues: Toes stay up, walk on heels only, feel shins working, maintain lifted toes

description.overview: Classic full-body exercise jumping feet apart while raising arms. Builds cardiovascular fitness and coordination.
description.setup: Standing with feet together, arms at sides. Ready for rhythmic jumping movement.
description.movement: Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead. Return to start position. Maintain rhythm.
description.cues: Rhythmic movement, arms and legs coordinate, land softly, maintain steady pace

description.overview: Running in place bringing knees high toward chest. Builds hip flexor strength and cardiovascular fitness.
description.setup: Standing ready to run in place. Focus on bringing knees as high as possible.
description.movement: Run in place bringing alternating knees to chest level. Quick feet, high knees.
description.cues: Knees to chest, quick feet, stay on balls of feet, pump arms

description.overview: Running in place kicking heels toward glutes. Improves hamstring flexibility and coordination.
description.setup: Standing ready to run in place. Focus on kicking heels back toward glutes.
description.movement: Run in place kicking alternating heels back toward glutes. Quick turnover.
description.cues: Heels to glutes, quick turnover, light on feet, feel hamstrings

description.overview: Explosive lunge variation jumping and switching legs mid-air. Builds lower body power and coordination.
description.setup: Start in lunge position. Ready for explosive jumping movement with leg switching.
description.movement: Jump explosively switching legs in air, landing in opposite lunge. Continuous alternating.
description.cues: Explosive jump, switch legs in air, soft landings, maintain rhythm

description.overview: Explosive jump bringing knees to chest. Develops vertical power and core strength.
description.setup: Athletic stance ready for maximum vertical jump. Clear overhead space.
description.movement: Jump vertically bringing knees to chest. Land softly and immediately repeat.
description.cues: Maximum jump height, knees to chest, soft landings, continuous rhythm

description.overview: Lateral plyometric exercise mimicking speed skating motion. Builds lateral power and single-leg stability.
description.setup: Athletic stance ready to bound laterally. Clear lateral space for movement.
description.movement: Bound laterally landing on outside leg while sweeping inside leg behind. Alternate sides.
description.cues: Explosive lateral bounds, land on outside leg, sweep behind, maintain balance

description.overview: Shoulder mobility exercise using resistance band. Improves shoulder flexibility and prepares shoulders for overhead work.
description.setup: Hold resistance band with wide grip, arms extended. Band should have light tension.
description.movement: Pass band over head and behind back keeping arms straight. Return to front. Feel shoulder stretch.
description.cues: Arms stay straight, wide grip, feel shoulder stretch, control the movement

description.overview: Dynamic hip mobility exercise swinging leg forward and back. Prepares hips for movement and improves range.
description.setup: Hold support for balance, swing leg ready. Standing leg stable, core engaged.
description.movement: Swing leg forward and back in controlled motion. Feel hip flexors and hamstrings warming.
description.cues: Controlled swings, feel hip opening, use support for balance, both directions

description.overview: Hip mobility exercise making circles with raised knee. Improves hip range of motion and activation.
description.setup: Standing with support if needed. Ready to lift knee and make circular motions.
description.movement: Lift knee and make circles, opening hip through full range. Both directions, both legs.
description.cues: Full circles, feel hip opening, both directions, control the movement

description.overview: Hip flexor and glute stretch bringing knee toward chest. Simple mobility exercise for hip preparation.
description.setup: Standing or lying position. Ready to bring knee toward chest for stretch.
description.movement: Pull knee toward chest feeling stretch in hip and glute. Hold briefly, switch legs.
description.cues: Knee to chest, feel the stretch, gentle pull, breathe into stretch

description.overview: Ankle mobility exercise flexing and pointing feet. Improves ankle range and activates lower leg muscles.
description.setup: Sitting or lying with legs extended. Feet ready for flexion and extension movements.
description.movement: Flex feet pulling toes back, then point toes away. Feel ankle and calf muscles working.
description.cues: Pull toes back, point toes away, feel ankle moving, controlled movement

description.overview: Ankle mobility exercise making circles with feet. Improves ankle range in all directions.
description.setup: Sitting or standing, ready to lift foot and make circular motions.
description.movement: Make circles with foot, moving ankle through full range. Both directions, both ankles.
description.cues: Full circles, move ankle through range, both directions, feel the movement

description.overview: Gentle leg swings for hip mobility. Low-intensity movement to prepare hips and improve range.
description.setup: Standing with support, ready for gentle leg swinging motions.
description.movement: Gently swing leg side to side like pendulum. Relaxed, rhythmic movement for hip mobility.
description.cues: Gentle swings, relaxed movement, feel hip loosening, rhythmic motion

description.overview: Dynamic full-body mobility exercise walking hands forward from standing. Builds flexibility, core strength, and serves as excellent warm-up.
description.setup: Standing tall, feet hip-width. Ready to hinge forward and walk out.
description.movement: Hinge to touch floor, walk hands to plank. Optional push-up. Walk feet to hands. Stand up. Repeat.
description.cues: Keep legs straight as able, strong plank position, controlled movement, feel the stretch

description.overview: Shoulder mobility exercise making circles with arms. Warms up shoulders and improves range of motion.
description.setup: Standing with arms extended to sides. Ready for circular arm movements.
description.movement: Make circles with arms, starting small and increasing size. Both forward and backward directions.
description.cues: Start small, increase size, both directions, feel shoulders warming up

description.overview: Shoulder mobility exercise rolling shoulders up, back, and down. Relieves tension and improves shoulder function.
description.setup: Standing tall with arms at sides. Ready for shoulder rolling movements.
description.movement: Roll shoulders up, back, and down in circular motion. Feel tension releasing.
description.cues: Up, back, and down, feel tension release, smooth circles, both directions

description.overview: Box squat to lower box targeting deeper range. Builds strength at bottom position while teaching depth.
description.setup: Low box below parallel, bar positioned as preferred. Wider stance typically used.
description.movement: Sit back to low box maintaining tension. Brief pause. Explode up from deeper position.
description.cues: Sit back to low box, stay tight, explode from deep position, control the depth

description.overview: Box squat to higher box around parallel. Teaches squat mechanics while building confidence.
description.setup: Box at parallel height, bar positioned as preferred. Standard squat stance.
description.movement: Sit back to box at parallel. Brief pause maintaining tension. Drive up from seated position.
description.cues: Sit to parallel, stay tight on box, drive up strong, build confidence

description.overview: Deep hip flexor stretch using couch or elevated surface. Targets tight hip flexors from sitting.
description.setup: Back foot elevated on couch, front leg in lunge position. Hands on front thigh for support.
description.movement: Sink into stretch feeling deep hip flexor stretch. Hold position, breathe into stretch.
description.cues: Deep hip flexor stretch, sink into position, breathe deeply, feel the release

description.overview: Hip flexor stretch in standing lunge position. Accessible stretch for tight hip flexors.
description.setup: Lunge position with back leg straight. Hands on front thigh or hips for support.
description.movement: Push hips forward feeling stretch in back leg hip flexor. Hold and breathe into stretch.
description.cues: Push hips forward, feel back leg hip flexor, breathe into stretch, gentle pressure

description.overview: Modified pigeon pose for hip and glute flexibility. Targets hip external rotators and glutes.
description.setup: Front leg bent at 90 degrees, back leg extended. Hands supporting upper body.
description.movement: Sink into stretch feeling hip and glute opening. Breathe deeply into the stretch.
